Browse the source code of netbsd/external/lgpl3/gmp/dist/printf/obprntffuns.c

1/* __gmp_obstack_printf_funs -- support for gmp_obstack_printf and
2 gmp_obstack_vprintf.
3

5 CERTAIN TO BE SUBJECT TO INCOMPATIBLE CHANGES OR DISAPPEAR COMPLETELY IN
6 FUTURE GNU MP RELEASES.
7

9

13it under the terms of either:
14

17 option) any later version.
18

23 later version.
24
25or both in parallel, as here.

28WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY
29or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License
30for more details.

36#include "config.h"
37
38#if HAVE_OBSTACK_VPRINTF
39
40#define _GNU_SOURCE /* ask glibc <stdio.h> for obstack_vprintf */
41
42#include <stdarg.h>
43#include <stdio.h> /* for obstack_vprintf */
44#include <string.h>
45#include <obstack.h>
46
47#include "gmp.h"
48#include "gmp-impl.h"
49
50
51static int
52gmp_obstack_memory (struct obstack *ob, const char *ptr, size_t len)
53{
54 obstack_grow (ob, ptr, len);
55 return len;
56}
57
58static int
59gmp_obstack_reps (struct obstack *ob, int c, int reps)
60{
61 obstack_blank (ob, reps);
62 memset ((char *) obstack_next_free(ob) - reps, c, reps);
63 return reps;
64}
65
66const struct doprnt_funs_t __gmp_obstack_printf_funs = {
67 (doprnt_format_t) obstack_vprintf,
68 (doprnt_memory_t) gmp_obstack_memory,
69 (doprnt_reps_t) gmp_obstack_reps
70};
71
72#endif /* HAVE_OBSTACK_VPRINTF */
73
